title: Moroccan almond briouats
ingredients: ['300g ground almonds', '50g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 pinch powdered gum arabic', '1 pinch salt', '30g butter, melted', '2 tablespoons orange blossom water', '1 packet brik filo pastry (feuilles de brick)', 'melted butter, for brushing', '1 egg yolk, lightly beaten', 'oil for frying', '300g honey', 'crushed almonds, to garnish']
